overview: Young Berto is a glue-sniffing, street child that has fallen prey to human traffickers. When the street urchin meets Somascan Bro. Jerry, he finds refuge in the Casa Miani orphanage. But the brotherhood of the streets compel him to follow their code.
tagline: In the 16th century, a warrior pledged to serve the poor and abandoned. His legacy still stands today.
title: Paglaya sa Tanikala
